definition: the back of a body or object/to turn one's back/to hide something from/to learn by heart/to recite from memory/unlucky (slang)/hard of hearing
to be burdened/to carry on the back or shoulder

sentences.english: She closes her eyes and lies back on the seat.
sentences.chinese: 她閉上眼睛，靠到椅背上。

sentences.english: I unclenched my hands and looked at my fingers, white and bent.
sentences.chinese: 我靠在椅背上，鬆開雙手，看到手指煞白且無法伸直。

sentences.english: The shape of the holes that penetrate the chair back-rest has better be an ellipse.
sentences.chinese: 所述穿透椅背的孔的形狀最好是橢圓形。

sentences.english: Robert leaned back in his chair quiet and almost surly .
sentences.chinese: 羅伯特往椅背一靠，悶聲不響，幾近乖戾。

sentences.english: Carlo leaned back, his face flushed with gratification.
sentences.chinese: 卡羅靠在椅背上，感激涕零，滿面紅光。

sentences.english: His shoes were poised beside his desk and his tuxedo jacket was draped over the back of his admiral’s chair.
sentences.chinese: 他的鞋放在桌子旁，夜禮服外套搭在大班椅的椅背上。

sentences.english: I unclenched my hands and looked at my fingers, white and bent.
sentences.chinese: 在椅背上，鬆開雙手，看到手指煞白且無法伸直。

sentences.english: Available in genuine leather , half leather and fabric upholstery.
sentences.chinese: 椅座及椅背可選配全真皮，半真皮及顏色布料覆蓋。

sentences.english: Roll cover upward to top of seat back.
sentences.chinese: 向上滾動蓋至座位椅背的頂上。

sentences.english: I sat against the back of the chair and stretched my arms , I saw my fingers were so pallid and not unbent .
sentences.chinese: 我靠在椅背上，鬆開雙手，看到手指煞白且無法伸直。

sentences.english: Does the coat of guest hang after chair-back?
sentences.chinese: 賓客的外套掛在椅背後？

sentences.english: Two stockings were hanging over the back of the chair.
Amid rising confidence, they will be tempted to pat themselves on the back.
sentences.chinese: 隨着不斷上升的信心，他們將傾向於安心靠在椅背上。

sentences.english: Framework of backrest is made of mixture of nylon and glassfiber.
sentences.chinese: 椅背框架由尼龍和玻璃纖維混合物製成。

sentences.english: Available in genuine leather , half leather and different fabric upholstery.
sentences.chinese: 椅座及椅背可選配全真皮，半真皮及顏色布料覆蓋。

sentences.english: With flared arms and back, this sofa series gives off an aura of country yhic.
sentences.chinese: 微彎的靠手和椅背爲這系列沙發平添不少溫馨況味。

definition: one leg over the other (legs crossed)
sofa (loanword)/CL:條|条[tiao2],張|张[zhang1]/(Internet slang) the first reply or replier to a forum post
to relax with one's eyes closed
